text: Using the for-loop like you have, one way is this:

code:
def altElement(a):
    b = []
    j = False
    for i in a:
        j = not j
        if j:
            b.append(i)

    print b

text: j just keeps switching between 0 and 1 to keep track of when to append an element to b.
